description:
AJSM-37 EMBROIDERED CHIFFON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Chiffon Trouser:  Silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Maroon

This ensemble from ‘The Noorie’ is the unique piece of the collection showcased by Minal Khan. The composition of this ensemble is a captivating duet between the hues of black and maroon. The interplay of chiffon and silk creates a seamless fusion of delicate embroidery. The shirt is an authentic work of art, featuring a regal red carpet-worthy neckline and a border reminiscent of the opulent tapestries. The ornate pattern on the sleeves adds a dramatic flair, while the chaak border is trimmed with a delicate band of Maroon silk, lending an air of elegance. The diaphanous chiffon dupatta drapes softly, evoking a dreamy aura, while the understated satin trousers inspire the ensemble with a hint of refinement
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered Front Neckline On Maroon Silk
Embroidered Front On Chiffon
30'' Dyed Wide Width Chiffon For Back
1.5 Meter Embroidered Border For Front & Back Daman On Maroon Silk
Embroidered Sleeves On Chiffon
1 Meter Embroidered Border For Sleeves On Maroon Silk
2.5 Meter Embroidered Border For Chaak On Maroon Silk
2.5 Meter Embroidered Dupatta On Chiffon
1.5 Meter Wide Width Silk For Trouser
